settings.paragraph:
No more waiting for the doctor. No more debating endless options in the cold and flu aisle. No more uncertainty in how to get healthy.

Our team of healthcare professionals is simplifying your at-home cold and flu treatment by:

  • Providing easy and effective treatment options
  • Getting you in touch with the right healthcare professionals
  • Delivering your treatment quickly

All from the comfort of your home.

settings.heading: We Want to Know How Cold & Flu Season Impacts You
settings.paragraph:
At °Fluent, we take the power out of the flu by helping you know what to do, when and how.

Fill out our 5-minute survey to help us understand your past experience with a cold or flu, to help us make °Fluent services and product offerings even better. All information will be kept private and confidential.

Complete the survey below and you could be randomly selected to receive a °Fluent Cold & Flu Essentials Kit!

settings.heading: Take the Power Out of the Cold & Flu From the Comfort of Your Home
settings.subheading: At °Fluent, we simplify treating your cold and flu symptoms by combining telehealth and the treatment you need, all in one place. No doctor office visits or trips to the pharmacy. Sign up below to be the first to know when our service and products are available.

settings.heading:
Fill out our quick 5-minute survey to help us understand your past experience with a cold or flu, so we can make our product offerings even better.

In order to participate in our quick 5-minute survey, you must be 18 years of age or older and a resident of the U.S. or D.C. All information will be kept private and confidential.

Complete the survey and you could be randomly selected to receive a Cold & Flu Essentials Kit!
settings.preheading: We want to know how Cold & Flu season impacts you.

settings.heading: Thank you so much!
settings.paragraph:
You are now entered to receive a Cold & Flu Essentials Kit!

We appreciate the time you took to share your experience with us. If you are randomly selected to receive the kit, you will be notified via email.

settings.heading: In the meantime, here are some additional, medically-approved resources to guide your next steps in treating the cold or flu.
CONSULT
settings.sub-heading: Select your symptoms from the easy °Fluent online assessment.

settings.heading: CONFIRM
settings.sub-heading: Based on your symptoms, we quickly recommend safe and effective products and can also connect you with a healthcare professional.

settings.heading: How It Works. It’s Simple.
settings.subheading: Whether it’s a cold or the flu, we’ve got you covered. Get your symptoms assessed and your treatment plan delivered, all from the comfort of your home.
